hadiths.text: Yahya narrated that 'Abdullah bin Abi Qatadah said to him from his father, that:The Prophet [SAW] forbade mixing Az-Zahuw and dried dates, and mixing Al-Busr and dried dates, and he said: "Soak each one of them on its own in vessels that are tied shut

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الاِنْتِبَاذِ فِي الأَسْقِيَةِ الَّتِي يُلاَثُ عَلَى أَفْوَاهِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing Soaking (Of These Fruits) in Vessels That are Tied Shut
